Dmitry Sviridenko

Web-designer | Front-end developer

About

  • Age : 18 yo
  • City: Poltava
  • XP: 7 months
  • Like: Bike&Books
  • Love: Web-design

The work I try to perform at the highest quality, fully responsive and supports a wide range of devices. Each project is well-documented and code writing semantically, that would further his service was not difficult for me, and for third-party developers.

The development of love to experiment and use the latest technology from the world of the web, because it is fun :)

I come up with a stylized and intermediate states of interactive elements, if they are not painted designer. Add animation, if you want to spice up the layout. I write scripts for client-side logic that would make content interactive.

Sites typeset cross-browser, IE10+ support, if necessary. Before any project optimizes performance - is compressed and glued together styles, scripts and images without any loss in quality.

Familiar with these methods and tools like Git, Jenkins, Bitbucket, Agile / Scrum, which will allow me to quickly join your team.

Skills

I collect the project with gulp.js. To write a template to use the learning markup Jade, which will accelerate the development and to avoid duplication of code for a typical page blocks. To use styles preprocessors SASS (SCSS) and LESS. Also, bower and npm, without them anywhere :)

HTML5/CSS3
95%
JavaScript/jQuery
60%
Animation
85%

In many projects, customers require the ability to manage the content of your site. To achieve this, I integrate front-end templates and WordPress themes offer to implement user-defined functions using PHP.

WordPress
60%
PHP
40%

It is not always in their layouts, the designers manage to fully demonstrate all his ideas regarding the design of the site. Two years of experience with the products of Adobe (Photoshop, Illustrator, and Fireworks) will be sufficient, which would help you to display all that has been lost. To create layouts and wireframes prefer Sketch.
